name: hoVRboard
description:
hoVRboard is a thrilling freeriding game made for VR only. Learn the unique physics-based controls at your own pace – intuitive but hard to master!What to do on a hoVRboard?
  • Explore a huge open-world-like hoVRpark!
  • Master >30 challenges!
  • Unlock two more boards with different characteristics!
  • Race!
  • Jump!
  • Do Tricks!
  • Grind Rails!
  • Speed boost!
  • Shoot obstacles!
  • Try a halfpipe if you dare!
  • Transform your board into hoVRwings!
  • ...
  • Be creative!
